#summary Aardwolf Campaign MiniWindow
=== Table of Contents ===
<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= Introduction =

This is a plugin that puts campaign objectives into a miniwindow


= Help =
 {{{
/*
miniwin_cp 1 Options
-----------------------------------------------
toggle         : toggle the campaign miniwindow
help           : show help
set            : set script and window vars, show plugin vars when called with no arguments, 'window': show window vars, 'all': show all vars
*/
 }}}


= Installation ==
 * Required 
  * [miniwin]
  * [window]
  * [class]
  * [pluginhelper]
  * [verify]
  * [broadcast_cp]
 * download from stable [http://code.google.com/p/bastmush/source/browse/branches/stable/worlds/plugins/Aardwolf/miniwin_cp.xml here] (make a note of the revision, it will help troubleshoot) or checkout with subversion and copy into the directory <Mushclient Install Dir>\worlds\plugins\Aardwolf

= Troubleshooting =
 * the miniwindow will not show until the command "cp check" is run
